page.title: 07The Village Hall
page.content: Every Monday afternoon a room in the hall is opened which holds a library for the locals.When asked the villagers were all pleased with the library facilities and preferred it to a van.Once a month a doctor attends for a baby clinic. Without this the nearest is 5 miles away, and with no regular bus service this would mean hardship for some. The hall makes a lovely monthly meeting place for the Senior Residents. Regular evening bookings are bingo, youth club, Scots Club,Women's Institute and BeeKeepers. August Bank Holiday sees the Hanley Castle & Hanley Swan 33rd Annual Flower Show, which is the main fund raising activity for the village hall. A popular event which brings the villagers together and a chance for them to show their skills. This year the money is for painting the hall.
